1.content:
It all started one day when Scott was at work. He was cleaning up some of the junk that was lying around one of the back rooms. He was moving some boxes around when he bumped the leg of a set of shelves. Well, the shelves must have been pretty flimsy because they collapsed as soon as he hit it. The shelves were loaded with jars and containers of strange chemicals. No one really knew what they were. All of these chemicals came down on Scott. Some were like water, others were gooey. They splashed and mixed together as they hit him. His boss was concerned at first but, when he realized that the chemicals weren't causing any damage, he wasn't as worried. Despite the fact that it was only lunchtime, he told Scott he could have the day off and to go home, wash and rest up.

As he was leaving, his phone started to ring. It was his girlfriend. She was in the area doing some shopping and she thought it would be a good idea to grab lunch together.
Who is Scott's girlfriend?
